title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 260.3 - Citation of statutory authority for action
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 260.3 - Citation of statutory authority for action

State Regulations
A notice submitted for publication in the State Register in
relation to rule making action subject to the provisions of the State

Administrative Procedure Act shall specify the subdivision of the applicable
section of law authorizing the taking of such action. If the section does not
contain any subdivisions, a statement such as "(not subdivided)" shall follow
the citation of the section. If the statutory authority is a chapter of the
laws not reflected in any consolidated or unconsolidated law, the chapter law
and the bill section thereof shall be cited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
260.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
